Member Function Documentation

- (void EC2Image.)addBlockDeviceMapping: (EC2BlockDeviceMapping *)  blockDeviceMapping  

Adds a single object to blockDeviceMappings.

This function will alloc and init blockDeviceMappings if not already done.

- (void EC2Image.)addProductCode: (EC2ProductCode *)  productCode  

Adds a single object to productCodes.

This function will alloc and init productCodes if not already done.

- (void EC2Image.)addTag: (EC2Tag *)  tag  

Adds a single object to tags.

This function will alloc and init tags if not already done.

- (NSString * EC2Image.)description  

Returns a string representation of this object; useful for testing and debugging.

Returns:
A string representation of this object.
- (id EC2Image.)init  

Default constructor for a new object.

Callers should use the property methods to initialize this object after creating it.

Property Documentation

- (NSString *) imageOwnerAlias [read, write, retain]

The AWS account alias (e.g., "amazon", "redhat", "self", etc.

) or AWS account ID that owns the AMI.

- (NSString *) kernelId [read, write, retain]

The kernel associated with the image, if any.

Only applicable for machine images.

- (bool) publicValue [read, write, assign]

True if this image has public launch permissions.

False if it only has implicit and explicit launch permissions.

- (NSString *) ramdiskId [read, write, retain]

The RAM disk associated with the image, if any.

Only applicable for machine images.

- (NSString *) rootDeviceType [read, write, retain]

The root device type used by the AMI.

The AMI can use an Amazon EBS or instance store root device.

- (NSString *) state [read, write, retain]

Current state of the AMI.

If the operation returns available, the image is successfully registered and available for launching. If the operation returns deregistered, the image is deregistered and no longer available for launching.

Constraints:
Allowed Values: available, deregistered
